name: CondaAuthenticate
description: Authentication task for the conda client
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: configFile
inputs.label: .condarc file to authenticate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the .condarc file with the PAT for the channels you want to authenticate

messages.CondarcNotCondarc: The file you selected to authenticate (%s) is not a valid .condarc file.
messages.ConfigCondarcDoesNotExist: The .condarc file you selected at %s does not currently exist.
messages.CondarcMissingChannels: The .condarc file you selected must contain channels
messages.AuthenticatingThisConfigCondarc: Adding authentication for channels listed in this .condarc file at %s
messages.AddingAuthChannel: Adding auth for channel: %s with token name: %s
messages.EnvironmentVariableInUse: The environment variable for the alias %s is already in use and may be overwritten
messages.DuplicateChannel: The channel %s was listed multiple times
messages.UseDefaultChannelsProperty: Use the default_channels property to define custom default channels
messages.DuplicateCustomName: The custom channel or multichannel name %s was used multiple times
messages.CircularMultichannel: The custom multichannel %s has a circular reference
